android.car.hardware.property

类 ErrorState

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.hardware.property.ErrorState

  • public final class ErrorState
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to enumerate the possible error states. For Android 14, ErrorState is used by ADAS STATE properties in VehiclePropertyIds, but its use may be expanded in future releases.

    This list of states may be extended in future releases to include additional states.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  ErrorState.ErrorStateInt 

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int NOT_AVAILABLE_DISABLED
      Vehicle property is not available because the feature is disabled.
      static int NOT_AVAILABLE_POOR_VISIBILITY
      Vehicle property is not available because sensor or camera visibility is insufficient to use this feature.
      static int NOT_AVAILABLE_SAFETY
      Vehicle property is not available because there is a safety risk that makes this feature unavailable to use presently.
      static int NOT_AVAILABLE_SPEED_HIGH
      Vehicle property is not available because the vehicle speed is too high to use this feature.
      static int NOT_AVAILABLE_SPEED_LOW
      Vehicle property is not available because the vehicle speed is too low to use this feature.
      static int OTHER_ERROR_STATE
      This state is used as an alternative for any ErrorState value that is not defined in the platform.

    • 字段详细资料

      • OTHER_ERROR_STATE

        public static final int OTHER_ERROR_STATE
        This state is used as an alternative for any ErrorState value that is not defined in the platform. Ideally, implementations of vehicle properties should not use this state. The framework can use this field to remain backwards compatible if this enum is extended to include additional states.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NOT_AVAILABLE_DISABLED

        public static final int NOT_AVAILABLE_DISABLED
        Vehicle property is not available because the feature is disabled.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NOT_AVAILABLE_SPEED_LOW

        public static final int NOT_AVAILABLE_SPEED_LOW
        Vehicle property is not available because the vehicle speed is too low to use this feature.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NOT_AVAILABLE_SPEED_HIGH

        public static final int NOT_AVAILABLE_SPEED_HIGH
        Vehicle property is not available because the vehicle speed is too high to use this feature.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NOT_AVAILABLE_POOR_VISIBILITY

        public static final int NOT_AVAILABLE_POOR_VISIBILITY
        Vehicle property is not available because sensor or camera visibility is insufficient to use this feature. For example, this can be caused by bird poop blocking the camera, poor weather conditions such as snow or fog, or by any object obstructing the required sensors.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NOT_AVAILABLE_SAFETY

        public static final int NOT_AVAILABLE_SAFETY
        Vehicle property is not available because there is a safety risk that makes this feature unavailable to use presently. For example, this can be caused by someone blocking the trunk door while it is closing, or by the system being in a faulty state.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
